ygData.subject: Fish Scales
ygData.msgSnippet: Agreed.  On the last raid the two magicians there were constantly summoning waterstones in between fights.  Everyone had these hotkeyed in their main inventory
ygData.messageBody:
Agreed. On the last raid the two magicians there were constantly summoning
waterstones in between fights. Everyone had these hotkeyed in their main
inventory for quick access. Another option is the Fish Gill Extract potion.
I think they run around 12PP each.

Galtin of E'ci


> The fish there do drop scales, but not enough for you to rely solely
> on them, IMHO. Fish scales can be purchased in bulk from one of the
> merchants near Inn 3 in the east commonlands (bat wings too). A good
> idea would be to have a magician summon a couple of the appropriate
> rings or stones for everyone who doesn't have a Fishbone Earring or
> an Aqualung or a Rebreather. That way they have something ready in
> case of an emergency.
>
>
>
> >
> > I can't answer your question about bulk purchases but I do know a lot
> of the
> > the fishes you kill in Kedge drop fish scales so it shouldn't be hard
> for
> > rangers/druids to replenish their supplies while they are down there.
> >
> > Galtin of E'ci
> >
> > > The talk of Kedge Keep has me very interested and my Guild Leader
> and
> > > I've been planning an outing on ICQ. The question is; short of
> fishing;
> > > where can Fish Scales be purchased in bulk?
> > >
> > >
> >
>
